mithilaVibes_footer_desc: Celebrating the vibrant art, culture, and heritage of Mithila. Join us in preserving and sharing this beautiful tradition.
mithilaVibes_footer_policy_desc: This website is for cultural appreciation and educational purposes. All artwork remains the property of the original artists.
discover_culture: Discover the vibrant culture, art, and heritage of Mithila through stunning visuals and stories.
